fomod.Name: Devourment Refactor
fomod.Author: MarkDF, Gaz, Macross
fomod.Description: A modernized and heavily refactored version of Devourment -- based on Galmar1313's Devourment Male and Female (DMAF). Incorporates work from Rox, Macross, Gaz, Gherking, Galmar1313, ForgetfulHatter, Stranger, and many others.
